subject: better late than never
body:
Hi,

Sorry I took so long to get back with ya I had to take the 
Dog for a walk and run into town for some milk, anyways here 
is that site I told ya about. http://dahts.com I orderd from 
there and results are amazing.

Also too that Casino site that gives you $500.00 to play with
when you resister that I was talking to your mom about 
is here.. http://jigerdasert.com/micro/7  My brother played
last night for less than an hr and withdrew $900.00 he said he's
taking us all out for supper tonight.. Can't wait.

Anyways have a great weekend and hope to talk to 
you on Sunday
Krystina
